nodes.text: Colonel Sha'zee Pow was a Kel Dor female who worked as a security officer on the planet Dorin during the Clone Wars.

In about 21 BBY, the Confederacy of Independent Systems sympathizer Aviso used the XNA-580, an experimental machine that could alter the brainwaves of some species, to convince the Baran Do elders that a Jedi Padawan sought to bring death to Dorin. After the Padawan landed on Dorin with the clone trooper Alpha 58, Pow and a security detail arrested the pair and led them away, to be placed on trial.
